abstract: Branded products to be sold via HSN will include stainless steel cookware, small appliances and cutlery.
snippet: Branded products to be sold via HSN will include stainless steel cookware, small appliances and cutlery.
lead_paragraph: For the celebrity chefs Emeril Lagasse and Wolfgang Puck, the kitchen counter is about to grow more crowded with a new set of culinary tools.
